keyword: calories in soft serve ice cream
title: Calories in Soft Serve Ice Cream
meta_description: Discover calories in soft serve ice cream per 100 g serving, including carbs, fat, protein, and nutrition breakdowns for better tracking.
h1: Calories in Soft Serve Ice Cream
assumptions: Standard vanilla soft serve ice cream, full-fat dairy base, machine-dispensed.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, flavor, fat content, and serving size. Check labels or machine info when available.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of soft serve ice cream has about 222 kcal, with high carbs from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add chocolate syrup topping (1 tbsp per 100 g)

faqs.q: How many calories in soft serve ice cream per serving?
faqs.a: About 222 kcal per 100 g standard serving.

faqs.q: Is soft serve ice cream high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, around 25 g sugars per 100 g, mostly added.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in soft serve ice cream?
faqs.a: Approximately 11 g total fat, including 7 g saturated, per 100 g.

faqs.q: How does soft serve compare to regular ice cream calories?
faqs.a: Similar or slightly higher due to aeration; varies by recipe, around 200-250 kcal per 100 g.

faqs.q: Are there low-calorie options for soft serve ice cream?
faqs.a: Yes, low-fat or non-dairy versions can drop to 150-180 kcal per 100 g.
